Title: List all categories
Description: Verify all training categories are listed
Steps: 1. Navigate to Training Settings > Categories|2. View category list
Expected_Result: All categories displayed with code name and status

Title: Filter active categories only
Description: Verify filtering shows only active categories
Steps: 1. Navigate to categories|2. Toggle 'Active only' filter

Title: Create custom category
Description: Verify admin can create new category
Steps: 1. Click Add Category|2. Enter name code description|3. Save
Expected_Result: Category created and visible in list

Title: Update category
Steps: 1. Click Edit on category|2. Modify name|3. Save

Title: Deactivate category
Steps: 1. Click Edit|2. Set status to Inactive|3. Save
Expected_Result: Category marked inactive courses still visible

Title: Cannot delete system category
Expected_Result: Delete option not available or error shown

Title: List courses with pagination
Steps: 1. Navigate to Training Catalogue|2. Scroll or page through list

Title: Filter courses by category
Expected_Result: Only courses in selected category shown

Title: Filter courses by status
Expected_Result: Only courses with selected status shown

Title: Search courses by title
Steps: 1. Enter partial title in search|2. Submit

Title: Search courses by code
Steps: 1. Enter course code in search|2. Submit

Title: Create course with all fields
Description: Verify course creation with complete data
Steps: 1. Click Add Course|2. Fill all fields|3. Save
Expected_Result: Course created with all data preserved

Title: Create course - mandatory fields only
Description: Verify course creation with minimum data
Steps: 1. Click Add Course|2. Fill only required fields|3. Save

Title: Create course with prerequisites
Steps: 1. Create new course|2. Add prerequisites|3. Save

Title: Create course with refresher link
Steps: 1. Create initial course|2. Link refresher course|3. Save

Title: View course statistics
Expected_Result: Statistics show assignments completions pass rate

Title: List sessions with filters
Steps: 1. Navigate to Training Sessions|2. Apply filters

Title: Filter sessions by course
Expected_Result: Only sessions for selected course shown

Title: Schedule new session
Steps: 1. Click Schedule Session|2. Fill details|3. Save
Expected_Result: Session created and visible in calendar

Title: Schedule session with pre-enrollments
Steps: 1. Schedule session|2. Select users to enroll|3. Save

Title: View session enrollments
Steps: 1. View session detail|2. Check enrollments tab

Title: Enroll multiple users
Steps: 1. Open session|2. Select multiple users|3. Enroll

Title: Enroll to waitlist when full
Steps: 1. Attempt to enroll user in full session

Title: Auto-promote from waitlist
Preconditions: Session full with waitlist and enrollment cancelled
Expected_Result: First waitlisted user promoted to enrolled

Title: Self-enroll permitted course
Steps: 1. Worker views My Training|2. Clicks Book Session|3. Selects session

Title: Self-enroll blocked
Description: Verify self-enrollment blocked when not permitted
Expected_Result: Self-enrollment option not available or blocked

Title: Prevent duplicate enrollment
Steps: 1. Attempt to enroll same user again

Title: Prerequisites check on enrollment
Preconditions: Course has prerequisites user missing prerequisite

Title: Record attendance - attended
Steps: 1. Open session|2. Mark user as attended|3. Save

Title: Record attendance - absent
Steps: 1. Open session|2. Mark user as absent|3. Save
Expected_Result: Attendance recorded as absent no completion

Title: Record attendance - partial
Steps: 1. Open session|2. Mark user as partial|3. Save

Title: Record completion with score
Steps: 1. Record attendance|2. Enter score|3. Record result

Title: Auto-close assignments on completion
Preconditions: Users have assignments for completed course

Title: Filter by user
Expected_Result: Only assignments for selected user shown

Title: Filter by course
Expected_Result: Only assignments for selected course shown

Title: Create individual assignment
Steps: 1. Click Assign Training|2. Select user and course|3. Set due date|4. Save

Title: Prevent duplicate assignment
Preconditions: User already has assignment for course
Steps: 1. Attempt to assign same course again

Title: Bulk assign by role
Expected_Result: All users with role receive assignment

Title: Bulk assign by site
Expected_Result: All users at site receive assignment

Title: Bulk assign - skip already assigned
Steps: 1. Bulk assign including users with existing assignment
Expected_Result: Existing assignments skipped new ones created

Title: Update assignment due date
Steps: 1. Edit assignment|2. Change due date|3. Save

Title: Waive assignment
Expected_Result: Assignment marked as waived with reason

Title: Create role-based rule
Steps: 1. Create new rule|2. Select role type|3. Configure|4. Save

Title: Create site-based rule
Steps: 1. Create new rule|2. Select site type|3. Configure|4. Save

Title: Auto-assign on new user role match
Steps: 1. Create new user with matching role|2. Wait for job

Title: Auto-assign on user role change
Steps: 1. Change user role to match rule|2. Wait for job

Title: Disable rule
Expected_Result: Rule inactive new users not assigned

Title: Record completion manually
Steps: 1. Open Record Completion|2. Fill details|3. Save

Title: Calculate expiry date correctly
Expected_Result: Expiry date calculated from completion date + validity

Title: Record external training
Steps: 1. Record external training|2. Fill provider details|3. Save
Expected_Result: External completion recorded marked for verification

Title: Reject external completion
Steps: 1. Open verification queue|2. Reject with reason

Steps: 1. View My Training|2. Check assignments section

Steps: 1. View My Training|2. Check upcoming sessions
